short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances user experience while watching reels on web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Augmented Reels transforms the way you experience Instagram Reels by introducing a suite of powerful, user-friendly features designed to enhance your viewing pleasure and control. Here's why "Augmented Reels" is a must-have for any Instagram Reels enthusiast:

Effortless Auto-Scrolling: Say goodbye to manual scrolling! Our extension lets you enjoy a seamless, hands-free viewing experience by automatically advancing to the next reel as soon as the current one ends. You can toggle this feature on or off at your convenience with a simple, intuitive slider. Tip: use up/down arrow keys if you want to manually scroll between reels or the auto scroll and progress bar may not function properly.

Customizable Viewing Experience: Tailor your reel-watching experience to your liking with adjustable playback speed settings. Whether you prefer a slow-motion view or a quick recap, control is at your fingertips.

Enhanced Interaction: Dive deeper into the content you love with our easy-access comment section toggle. Engage with the community, share your thoughts, and participate in discussions without ever leaving your viewing flow.

Precise Control: Missed a detail? Want to skip ahead? Our extension offers quick seek buttons and keyboard shortcuts (Tip: use left/right arrow keys for ease of control), allowing you to rewind or fast-forward through reels in 5-second increments, ensuring you don't miss a beat.

Volume Mastery: With our built-in volume slider and mute button, you have complete control over the audio levels of your reels, ensuring an optimal listening experience tailored to your environment and preferences.

Dark Mode Compatibility: Whether you're a fan of Instagram's dark mode or prefer the light version, our extension seamlessly adapts, providing a consistent and eye-pleasing aesthetic that complements your chosen theme.

Draggable Control Center: Our thoughtfully designed control center not only bundles all these fantastic features in one convenient location but is also fully draggable, allowing you to position it anywhere on your screen for optimal accessibility without obstructing your view.

Real-Time Insights: Stay informed about your viewing habits with our watch time tracker, which displays the total time you've spent enjoying reels, helping you manage your screen time effectively.

User Feedback Empowerment: We value your input! Our built-in feedback form makes it easy for you to share your thoughts, suggestions, or issues directly with us, ensuring that "Augmented Reels" continues to evolve based on your needs and preferences.

"Augmented Reels" is more than just an extension; it's a comprehensive toolkit designed to elevate your Instagram Reels experience to new heights. By offering a blend of automation, customization, and control, it empowers you to watch, engage with, and manage reels in a way that's aligned with your preferences and lifestyle. Try it today and transform the way you interact with Instagram Reels!
